GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the requested article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects with comments for the requested article

comments.body: Esse et expedita harum non. Voluptatibus commodi voluptatem. Minima velit suscipit numquam ea. Id vitae debitis aut incidunt odio quo quam possimus ipsum.
comments.author: cooljmessy
